entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 18
CALM WINDS

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40
